[{"id":"3fd4037f-7ccc-4af5-be50-fc422e681803","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: retrieve_subscript_names","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7dc7f15d-4579-4472-99c9-3fa0432b7dac","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"retrieve_subscript_names","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function resolves subscript expressions (such as ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_list[0]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_dict['key']","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") by determining the specific namespaces or values being accessed. It acts as a specialized decoder that handles the relationship between a container and its indices or keys, returning the set of definitions that the expression may reference at a specific line in the code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7747eb96-930d-43c1-b530-fd82e769ad3b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis of collections is challenging because data types are often nested inside structures like lists or maps. Simply identifying a variable as a "dictionary" does not explain what happens when the code retrieves a value from it. This function performs a deep inspection of the container's internal storage (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"memo","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). By resolving both the container and the specific key being used, it allows the analyzer to trace data flow through collections, ensuring that if an object is stored in a dictionary and later retrieved via a key, its identity and properties are preserved.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c77ac08a-ffa0-44ad-9855-a02389d5d16c","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b44aa750-1225-4c69-bc5f-c13eabd8c708","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Node Decoding:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"e906f7db-0810-4ed1-9892-927bd27f46d2","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The Slice:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It decodes the index or key being used. It handles literal values (like an integer index or a string key) and variables that resolve to keys.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"30c3b701-f80f-44bb-aba6-b1e63872c0ff","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The Container:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It decodes the base object (e.g., the variable name of the list or dictionary).","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"c9add040-5464-4a5e-9641-4f84ee9954bf","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Pointer through any chains of references (such as parameters or assignments) to find its original ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"memo","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"de2e3437-f4d4-4165-b134-91829a3f76e0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It identifies all values associated with the relevant keys or indices.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ecfa56d7-1637-4948-b93d-ab76194fed02","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":""host"","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"beffdc3f-1bac-4349-8424-c637f8482e5e","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It
